content.rendered:
Experience:

2-5 years

Core:

  • Languages – High proficiency in Java/ Python/JavaScript and its related tools.
  • Frameworks – Proficiency in Spring boot, Spring Framework, React, Flask, Django and SQLAlchemy.
  • Data Stores – Proficiency in MySQL and Mongo
  • Messaging – Proficiency in RabbitMQ/Other messaging frameworks like Kafka, Active MQ
  • Proficiency in Web Technologies – HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, Bootstrap, SCSS
  • Proficiency in Python – Well knowledge in core Python and collections

Good to have:

  • Experience in Data modeling
  • to performance testing/tuning using JMeter” or “End to End page performance Analysis using google page-speed/other-tools”
  • Working knowledge in React, Node JS.
  • Working knowledge in Python with RESTful WebServices.

X-factors

  • End to End Page performance Analysis and Tuning
  • Dev Ops – Knowing about DevOps
  • Agile Framework
